title: IS_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_GEN9_EXCLUSIVE
content:
0xC767B581// IsPedComponentVariationGen9Exclusive
bool IS_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_GEN9_EXCLUSIVE(Ped ped, int componentId, int drawableId);Parameters:ped: The target ped.componentId: The component id.drawableId: The drawable id.Returns: Whether or not the ped component variation is a gen9 exclusive (stub assets).Examples:Lualocal ped = PlayerPedId()

for component = 0, 12 do
  local count = GetNumberOfPedDrawableVariations(ped, component)

  for drawable = 0, count - 1 do
    if IsPedComponentVariationGen9Exclusive(ped, component, drawable) then
      print("Component " .. component .. " drawable " .. drawable .. " is a gen9 exclusive, skip!")
    end
  end
end
codeBlocks:
// IsPedComponentVariationGen9Exclusive
bool IS_PED_COMPONENT_VARIATION_GEN9_EXCLUSIVE(Ped ped, int componentId, int drawableId);

local ped = PlayerPedId()

for component = 0, 12 do
  local count = GetNumberOfPedDrawableVariations(ped, component)

  for drawable = 0, count - 1 do
    if IsPedComponentVariationGen9Exclusive(ped, component, drawable) then
    end
  end
end
